electricityContract.terms: Please visit www.lumoenergy.com.au/terms for full T&Cs applicable to this offer. Solar Feed-In T&Cs can be found at www.lumoenergy.com.au/metering-and-solar. All times are AEST, unless you have an interval meter, in which case daylight savings time will apply. We will issue your bill at least quarterly, or if you have a Smart Meter, monthly, unless you have requested to be billed quarterly or your Smart Meter does not have active telecommunications.
electricityContract.variation: We may vary our rates no more than once per 6 months. We will publish any variation in a newspaper and on our website at least 10 business days before it starts. We also notify you of the variation by no later than your next bill.

eligibility.information: This offer is available to small business customers currently within the Citipower distribution zone with applicable network tariff. For more information contact 1300 115 866.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Your contract is ongoing until it is ended by you or us.
